stepTitle: The number of bacteria in a refrigerated food product is given by $$N(T)=23T^2-56T+1$$, $$3<T<33$$, where T is the temperature of the food. When the food is removed from the refrigerator, the temperature is given by $$T(t)=5t+1.5$$, where $$t$$ is the time in hours. Find the composite function N(T(t)).
